name: Neogen Corporation
description: Neogen Corporation is a leading global provider of food safety and animal health products. Founded in 1982, Neogen is dedicated to protecting the world’s food supply and improving animal health through innovative solutions. The company's extensive portfolio includes tests for the detection of pathogens, allergens, and toxins in food products, as well as a wide range of veterinary pharmaceuticals and diagnostics for livestock and companion animals. Neogen's commitment to research and development has positioned it at the forefront of the food safety and animal health industries, with products that are used by food manufacturers, food service providers, and agricultural producers worldwide. The company maintains a strong focus on innovation, continuously expanding its product lines to meet the evolving needs of its customers. With a mission to enhance the safety and quality of food and animal products, Neogen plays a critical role in ensuring public health and animal welfare.

faq.answer: Neogen is headquartered in Lansing, Michigan, USA.
